channel.title: docker on Blog of retrhelo
channel.description: Recent content in docker on Blog of retrhelo

item.title: Set up WeChat on Linux with Docker
item.description: WeChat is a popular IM (Instant Message) software in China, and is widely used in business situations. However, Tecent, the corporation behind WeChat, serves to provide no support for this popular app in Linux environment.

item.title: SSH to container on remote server
item.description: Containerization is a concept of importance in today’s network service. And Docker is one of the most successful container management tools. This article notes down how I deploy a container on remote, and access it via SSH.
